website_summaries.verdict: A wrap-around pair for men that’s good for sports.
pros: Great value for a sport-style wrap
Particularly suited to round or oval faces
Can be worn comfortably with hats
cons: Larger heads may find them tight

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Good fit for Men With Large Hat Sizes
customer_reviews.text: These are getting harder to find and they're the only sunglasses my son will wear. This version is a little different/updated, with a more subtle logo than the previous model, but actually looks even better than before. They fit a larger head well (he wears a size 8 hat) and wrap for outstanding protection against glare.
customer_reviews.author: K. White

customer_reviews.title: I was a little worried about what the quality would be like because they're cheaper than what we've paid for sunglasses ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sunglasses for my husband and he loves them. He's had them for about 8 months now and they're still going strong, even after our toddler has gotten his hands on them. I was a little worried about what the quality would be like because they're cheaper than what we've paid for sunglasses in the past, but these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses not the darkest lense though I don’t mind that😎
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunglasses and they are made in Italy and they’re the best fit sunglasses and I’ve tried a bunch different brands and I can usually find these for half the price Of retail I don’t mind buying last year’s model😎😎👍
customer_reviews.author: Elements

customer_reviews.title: my favorite sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 3rd pair (due to a family member taking one pair, one temporarily lost but now found, and this was a back up pair). They are so light and comfortable you barely feel them on your face. They are fairly dark as well which is nice in sand and snow. I have also tried the electric technician glasses which are also very comfortable but much heavier. Sunglasses are so variable based on preferences/styles and the shape of one's face, but for me these are great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Lawall

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: very happy! I own a lot of expensive sunglasses and these do a great job at cutting out the glare. As good if not better than the expensive pairs I own. Also very light.
customer_reviews.author: zenman

customer_reviews.title: The closest you will get to the discontinued EC/DC's
customer_reviews.text: This is my seventh pair in 13 years, nothing but good things to say about this brand. I use them at the beach, at the pool, to work, basically everywhere and they hold up just fine as long as you take proper care. Very happy overall that I found this model at a great price, thanks to Prime I received this in less than 24 hrs..
customer_reviews.author: MaikyMoto

customer_reviews.title: Good shades
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few months ago. They do good and they are fairly priced. The only thing I don't like about them is that they accumulate dust like a swiffer duster. I keep them in my closed center console and bust them out a few times a week, and they always have dust and little hairs all over the lenses. Could just be me I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hanson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shades!
customer_reviews.text: Lenses are fantastic, excellent fit- can't leave home without them!
customer_reviews.author: toddl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses, super lightweight, really comfortable under aviation headsets, great lenses for tactical situations, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Will James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shades
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these sun glasses are awesome! Much brighter than my old pair of Electric sun glasses, but half the cost. I like this company because they honor their commitments to replace sun glasses for a life time. Great shades from a great company, at a great price. Wow, I should market that....
customer_reviews.author: Murphy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love sunglasses, and so far Electric has been the company I keep coming back to. I’ve had these now for easily 2 years, and I still wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my man! He loves this brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my man! He loves this brand, and wanted the ECDC, but they only had white, so this one is the next closest thing!.. True to size and style as if buying them from a Surf Shop!!.. Shipped on time and in the usual small black rectangle box with little storage/cleaning bag!.. Will deff by again!
customer_reviews.author: B Baby

customer_reviews.title: The best sunglasses I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best sunglasses I have ever had.Do not pay too much money.It has the Quality just like any other Famous expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses... not to big, not too small for a medium / large face guy. Got the Union Tort Frame with Grey Lenses and they're sharp... a nice darkish blue / grey on the frames that look nice. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: kandb

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitting, a TAD small but thats only because I have a fat head probably. Killer glasses for the price, nicely made. Electric is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: great price fit is good
customer_reviews.text: great price fit is good can wear with hats no pitching of the ears like with other sunglasses i have had
customer_reviews.author: Slayerpsp

customer_reviews.title: good  set of shades
customer_reviews.text: really like these glasses. can wear them all day and the color is not too bright really glad I picked these up. Had another pair that had warped in the heat and was in need of another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great shades
customer_reviews.text: Cool ,great quality shades, at great prices. Worth checking them out.
customer_reviews.author: kristo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Better quality from Walmart.
customer_reviews.text: The arm broke in less than 2 weeks so I gave them to my aunts dog for a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, great glasses for the price! I've had expensive Electrics as well and i cannot tell any quality difference.
customer_reviews.author: Scott MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: I wanted sunglasses with slim arms, and these are fairly slim, but not as slim as I wanted. They are still good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aungst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glasses
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality glasses, excellent lenses and very comfortable. Barely tell they are on. Great buy, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tbonexas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses feel great and do the job with style. Best price anywhere. I have recommended to friends/family. I couldn't be any happier!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Iles

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for my husband and he loved them. Great fit. Not loose. Nice wrap glasses for sports.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these electric sunglasses. They fit really well. They are quite stylish and do block the sun out. Ive had good success with many diffrent styles of the electrics so i would continue to buy them in the future\
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Aceto

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good quality for the price. The fit is a little snug for me but I would say I have an above average head size. The bag they come in is very handy to clean the lenses. I have also had the Electric K.O.'s and these are similar but a bit smaller. Better suited for men than the K.O.'s were,
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting!
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller head so most sunglasses fall of easy, especially when I set them on top my head. These glasses look great and stay on my head pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: br688864

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They are super light and don't rub against ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are super light and don't rub against the back of my cauliflower ears. I wear them all day fishing and my eyes feel great. I thought the 'melanin infused' was some sort of gimmick, but I think that's the reason why my eyes are so comfortable. I've exclusively bought 'Dragons' sunglasses in the past, but I like these better.
customer_reviews.author: Tk

product_meta.title: Electric Visual Charge Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Electric Visual is a leading manufacturer of sunglasses, goggles, and accessories in the action sports industry. All of their products are tested through their extensive team in the harshest of conditions. All products are made with the highest quality materials on the market. The brand strives to give you products that make you feel good about yourself, and will last the test of time.
